                          throws ServerOverloadException

        Returns:

      • getInheritedAccess

        public GroupAwareEntity.AccessMode getInheritedAccess()
        Description copied from interface: GroupAwareEntity
        Access the actual access mode used to compute who has access to the entity (usually SITE or GROUPED, but not INHERITED). This may be defined locally or inherited from elsewhere for the entity. If the local access mode is INHERITED, the actual access mode must be retrieved from elsewhere.
        Specified by:
        getInheritedAccess in interface GroupAwareEntity
        Returns:
        The actual access mode for the entity.

      • getInheritedGroupObjects

        public Collection getInheritedGroupObjects()

        Specified by:
        getInheritedGroupObjects in interface GroupAwareEntity
        Returns:
        A Collection (Group) of group objects defined for this entity; empty if none are defined.

        Specified by:
        getInheritedGroups in interface GroupAwareEntity
        Returns:

        Specified by:

        Returns:

      • getUrl

        public String getUrl(boolean relative)
        Description copied from interface: ContentEntity
        Access the URL which can be used to access the entity. Will return a relative or absolute url, depending on value of the parameter. If parameter is true, URL will be relative to the server's root. Otherwise, it will be a complete URL starting with the base URL of the server.
        Specified by:
        getUrl in interface ContentEntity
        Returns:
        The URL which can be used to access the resource.
